black.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Right ] [ "Left ] [ "Down ] [ "Up ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

king.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "DownRight ] [ "DownLeft ] [ "UpRight ] [ "UpLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

piece.setBack:
to setBack [ :piece ] [
    ifelse hasclass :piece "red [
            sethl :piece "wizardselected.png     ] [
         sethl :piece "witchselected.png ]  ]

red.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "Right ] [ "Left ] [ "Down ] [ "Up ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]
